div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 282 Attica, 1937 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T) Contents: 118 AE Boeotia: 1 (as BMC pl. 6, 8) Athens: 113 New Style (as Svoronos pl. 22, 53-8 [22]; pl. 81 [91], nearly half with pilei symbol) 2 "Delian" type (as Sv. pl. 106, 1-7) 1 "Eleusinian" type (as Sv. pl. 103, 50-6) Eleusis: 1 (as Sv. pl. 103, 1 ff.) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1937, p. 443 (no details)
